snippet.title: Namco Dead Heat Arcade Driver attract mode video
snippet.description: Namco's newest arcade driver, Dead Heat, is the only arcade driving game that utilizes social networking. As you race other players, they get added to your "friends" list. The more people you race, the larger your friends list grows. Patented software technology analyzes and records your driving style to accurately replicate it as a computer opponent in future races for your friends. This state-of-the-art technology blurs the line between human and artificially intelligent opponents. A picture is taken of each racer and placed over their cars during the race so players can quickly identify their opponents. Dead Heat is an intense driving game that focuses on head-to-head competition. 4 units can be linked together.
